title: FontIcon FontFamily not applied by Style
body:
I have a Style targeting a FontIcon control with a Setter for the FontFamily.
When adding a FontIcon control and Setting the Style to the StaticResource, the FontFamily is not applied.
I have to add FontFamily on each FontIcon control

comments.body: Thanks for the report.  We are planning to fix in the next update to Windows.

Same here, this is still broken in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update (16299)
See repro:
https://twitter.com/martinsuchan/status/951042328055156736
FontIcon.FontSize not applied by Style either.
I am using a custom font that is added to my package, and references using the ms-appx:// syntax.
